summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use code enforcement, amending Sections 23.90.006, 23.90.008, 23.90.014, 23.90.018, 23.90.019; 23.90.020, 23.90.022; 23.91.006, 23.91.012, adding new Sections 23.90.015 and 23.90.025, and repealing Section 23.90.022 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
note: See CB 115899 for the corrected version of this Bill.
